price: 12. Maxaydaan markaad maqasheen (qadafkaa) ugu malayn mu’miniinta rag iyo haweenba khayr isla dadkoodaasi, oo ay u odhan: “Waxakani waa been abuur cad?”
arabic: لَّوۡلَآ إِذۡ سَمِعۡتُمُوهُ ظَنَّ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتُ بِأَنفُسِهِمۡ خَيۡرٗا وَقَالُواْ هَٰذَآ إِفۡكٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lawlā idh samiʿ'tumūhu ẓanna al-mu'minūna wal-mu'minātu bi-anfusihim khayran waqālū hādhā if'kun mubīnun
